name: DreamEater
description:
Story setting:
A person suddenly has the ability to change reality through dreams, and he has come to a company with a lot of beautiful girls. What kind of things will he do?

The advantages of the game:
  • First person narrative game
  • Realistic game characters
  • A lot of beautiful 3D animations
  • Game scenes close to real effects
  • A story based on a famous novel
  • Dozens of high quality BGM
  • Depending on your choice, different results will appear

The disadvantages of the game:
  • The game process is short
  • less operability

PS: This is just an indie game developed by 2 people. Please don't expect too much.
